item.description:
www.chillertheatre.com/main.htm

Look at the link for the event details;
October 6
Leaving the Trumbull Mall around 11:00 a.m.

Anyone coming from New Haven is invited to meet me in West Haven.
Take I-95, get off Exit 43 on Rte 122 / First Avenue.
Take a left on Rte 122. Go under the high way.
Take a right into the Park and Ride.
If you are still a serious Yes on Thursday, October 4, then I
Will send you my cell phone number to contact me.
ETA between 10:30 to 11 a.m.

A few of us might Meet Up in West Haven on route.

Some of the other members will meet up on route at Westfield Shoppingtown Trumbull Mall.

www.westfield.com/trumbull/

I have decided that there will be two locations at the Trumbull Mall.
The primary location will be at Circuit City parking lot by the Trumbull Mall.
Take Rt 15.
Get off Exit 48 on to Rt. 111 Newtown Tnpk / Main Street.
Follow signs to the Mall.
Go into the Mall. Veer to the right. You will see Circut City on your left.
I drive a 2002 Green Honda Passport SUV.
I have a Meet Up sign to put into the back window when parked.
Some members might not want to wait in a parking lot,
so secondary location to meet members will be at Ruby Tuesdays.
Go into the Mall. Veer to the left.
Ruby Tuesdays is between Lord and Taylor and the construction parking area
on the left of Lord and Taylor.
If you are going to wait at Ruby's, then you should get there earlier to get
Your order and be ready to leave between 11 to 11:30.
I have glasses, a beard and might carry a conspiracy book to better
Recognize me. If you do not already have my cell number and you are seriously going
Then I will send you my cell number on Thursday night October 4.
I did go to the Trumbull Mall on 9/24 to remember where things were.

We will be driving to
Chiller Theatre Toy, Model and Film Extravaganza
Hilton Hotel
Parisippany, New Jersey, 07054

Directions can be found on the link.

I do go a different way so that my Directions will be;

From West Haven I 95 to Exit 38 veer left towards
The Merritt Parkway that later becomes the
Hutchinson River Parkway to Exit 26 West on to
I 287 West and I 87. Take exit 15 to get off I 87
To stay on I 287.
(FYI Exit 55 has a Wendys if you need a break.)
Exit 39B to Rte 10 W towards Dover.
Exit on to Dryden Way.
Left on Campus Drive.
Left on Hilton Ct.
You can Park in the Building Complex on the Left.
Short Walk to the Hilton Hotel beyond the Pond on the
Right.

On Saturday morning, 9/8, I added in our Message link a revised trip report
From an earlier convention that I went to in order
to give an idea of what the Cons are like.

To answer the question of what is Chiller Con.
Chiiller Con has a few things happening at once, various vendors are selling their products such as DVDs or Model Figurines or Magazines or Autographed Photos, etc. Newer Genre or B Movie Stars are there to promote their most recent genre movies. Older stars come out of their retirement to meet their fans. Wrestlers and other kinds of entertainers also come out to meet their fans. The October Show has the fans dressed up in all kinds of costumes, esp but not limited to Goth clothes.

It is usually lots of fun.

Esp. for the October show, you should have tried to get advanced tickets.
The deadline for advanced tickets was September 21 so it has passed.
I have already received my tickets.
Remember to bring your cameras.
A listing of stars / guests will also come in handy.
There might be long lines to get some autographs.

www.chillertheatre.com/gt/gtc4.htm

The Expo is all weekend from October 5 to 7.
I am going on October 6. If you want me to make it for a
Meet Up for another day if your group is going on a different day,
But still want it to count as a meet up for this group,
Then please let me know. I will not be attending the event any other day.

Maybe RSVP will be allowed up to Thursday, October 4.
On Friday, October 5 Maybe RSVP will become No.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Chiller Theatre Expo in New Jersey on 10/6
